attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app because I was sick and tired of having fake mainstream media give me fake news left and right! I felt like I could no longer trust anyone, not even my own family, with news and updates. So I gave this app a try and ğŸ˜±ğŸ˜±ğŸ˜± the horror that I came across. I could not believe it! This app tries feeding me EVEN MORE LIES than I already came across on YouTube, Facebook, and twitter. Everywhere I look is lies! I donâ€™t have anyone left to trust, my husband left me, my children donâ€™t talk to me, my mother and father wonâ€™t even look at my face anymore. I felt so blind sighted and thought this app would be my saving grace, but I guess Iâ€™m going to have to cut out all news sources altogether. I vow to live out in the country away from everyone and never speak to another soul again. Canâ€™t trust nobody.
